short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-driven adventures where your digital pets reward you for taking care of them! Feed, Explore, Battle & Earn Rewards!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
K.O.I brings the excitement of virtual pet ownership to your social media experience on X. 

This Chrome extension lets you adopt and care for digital pets while you browse, integrating seamlessly with your daily social interactions. 

Earn rewards by engaging on X, feed your pets, and watch them grow. With K.O.I, transform your social feed into a fun, interactive pet-raising adventure. 

Collect unique pets, compete with friends, and enjoy a whole new dimension to your social media usage. 

Perfect for animal lovers and casual gamers looking to add a touch of fun to their online activities.

Spin the daily wheel for exciting prizes, and rack up points to climb the leaderboard.
